definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

sentences.english: The new teacher really rates with the director of our department.
sentences.chinese: 這位新來的教師深受我係系主任的好評。

sentences.english: Dr. Kai-ling Liu, Chair of FLLD, who serves as the adviser.
sentences.chinese: 劉開鈴教授，外文系的系主任，擔任指導工作。

sentences.english: Each Faculty is run by a Dean who coordinates the work of Departments.
sentences.chinese: 每個學院由一個座標系系主任誰的工作部門。

sentences.english: They've made me head of department.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們系的系主任王先生。

sentences.english: Professor Wang Hu heads the Department.
The dean turned away two applicants this morning.
sentences.chinese: 上午，系主任打發走了兩個申請人。

sentences.english: They cap when they pass the dean.
sentences.chinese: 他們路遇系主任的時候脫帽示敬。

sentences.english: Susan, I'd like you to meet our Department Chair Professor Song.
sentences.chinese: 蘇珊，我希望你能認識一下我們的系主任宋教授。

sentences.english: McDaniel is chair of the department of psychology at the University of New Mexico.
sentences.chinese: 麥克丹尼爾是美國新墨西哥大學心理系主任。

sentences.english: Here comes a man. The man is dean of our department.
sentences.chinese: 一個男人走來了，這個人是我們的系主任。

sentences.english: This is Mr. Wang , dean of our department .
sentences.chinese: 這是我們系的系主任王先生。

sentences.english: Pro-dean for research, Professor in Chinese Studies, Faculty of Humanities.
sentences.chinese: 挪威奧斯陸大學人文學院前系主任，中國研究教授。

sentences.english: Professor Su is a newly-appointed department head.
sentences.chinese: 蘇教授是新任命的系主任。

sentences.english: The dean of our department give a enthusiastic speech at the school-opening ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 我們的系主任在開學典禮上做了一個富有激情的演講。

sentences.english: He has obtained the consent of the dean for going abroad.
sentences.chinese: 他出國已經取得系主任的同意。

sentences.english: Now he heads the agronomy department.
sentences.chinese: 現在他擔任農藝系系主任。

definition: (Tw) teacher in charge of a class/homeroom teacher
deputy chair of board/vice-president (of a university etc)
to join the faculty of one's alma mater upon graduation/to remain at school during vacation
the head of an institution whose name ends in 院[yuan4]/chair of a board/president of a university/department head/dean/premier of the Republic of China/CL:個|个[ge4]
